definition[0]: someone who does a job willingly without being paid
example[0]: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
definition[1]: someone who is willing to offer help
example[1]: I need some volunteers to help with the washing-up.
definition[2]: someone who joins the army, navy, or air force without being forced to
definition[3]: to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do
example[2]: I volunteered my services as a driver.
example[3]: Helen volunteered to have Thanksgiving at her house this year.
definition[4]: to tell someone something without being asked
example[5]: Michael volunteered the information before I had a chance to ask.
definition[5]: to offer to join the army, navy, or air force
example[6]: When war broke out, my father volunteered immediately.
definition[6]: to say that someone else will do a job even though they may not want to do it
example[7]: Mum volunteered Dave for washing-up duties.
